variant.name: Lock
variant.description: Lock mode - gimbal maintains absolute orientation

variant.name: Follow
variant.description: Follow mode - gimbal follows vehicle yaw

variant.name: FPV
variant.description: FPV mode - gimbal follows all vehicle movements

message.name: SendRcChannelDataRequest
message.description: Send RC channel data to gimbal

message.name: RequestFlightControllerDataStreamRequest
message.description: Request flight controller to send data stream

message.name: SendGpsData
message.description: Send GPS raw data to gimbal

field.name: sta
field.description: Not enabled or AI mode enabled

field.name: sta
field.description: 0: Not enabled, 1: Outputting, 2: AI not enabled, 3: Tracking not enabled
